query:
SELECT 
  re.id,
  re.amount,
  re.description,
  re.createdAt,
  c.email as affiliate_email,
  ref_customer.email as referral_email,
  r.firstRechargeAmount,
  r.status as referral_status
FROM referral_earnings re
JOIN customers c ON re.affiliateId = c.id
LEFT JOIN referrals r ON re.referralId = r.id
LEFT JOIN customers ref_customer ON r.referredId = ref_customer.id
WHERE c.email = 'fcokelrihbrito@gmail.com'
ORDER BY re.createdAt DESC
command:

  re.id,
  re.amount,
  re.description,
  re.createdAt,
  c.email as affiliate_email,
  ref_customer.email as referral_email,
  r.firstRechargeAmount,
  r.status as referral_status
FROM referral_earnings re
JOIN customers c ON re.affiliateId = c.id
LEFT JOIN referrals r ON re.referralId = r.id
LEFT JOIN customers ref_customer ON r.referredId = ref_customer.id
WHERE c.email = 'fcokelrihbrito@gmail.com'
ORDER BY re.createdAt DESC
